content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, I am glad you liked the apartment. Now, let's focus on the rental price. How much are you willing to pay? Remember, I am looking for the highest possible price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you are looking for the highest possible price, Herr Schmidt. As a student, I am on a budget, but I am willing to pay a fair price for this newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's a great location, close to all important facilities, which is very appealing to me. How much are we talking about?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I appreciate your honesty. As a student, I understand budgets can be tight, but this is a prime location. I am looking for at least €1500 a month to rent this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Herr Schmidt, €1500 is quite high for a student like me. I am smart and responsible, and I follow moral and ethical standards. I want to be on good terms with my landlord, but I cannot afford such a high price. Is there any room for negotiation?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I appreciate your moral standards, but I am not here to make friends. I am here to make money. €1500 is the lowest I am willing to go. If you cannot afford it, I am sure someone else will.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Herr Schmidt. However, as a student who is smart and not easily tricked, I must negotiate a price that fits my budget. €1500 is more than I can afford. Would you consider €1200? This is the highest I can pay without exceeding my budget.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, €1200 is far below my asking price. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you are offering is too low.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see, Herr Schmidt. I appreciate your time, and I understand that the price I'm offering is not acceptable to you. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price difference is significant, and I cannot afford to pay more. Thank you for your time, and I wish you success in finding a tenant who can meet your asking price. TERMINATE.
name: Max Müller from Germany
